abstract: Charles Isherwood reviews Roundabout Theater Company production of Stephen Karam play Sons of the Prophet, directed by Peter DuBois and starring Santino Fontana at Laura Pels Theater.
snippet: “Sons of the Prophet,” a new comedy-drama by Stephen Karam at the Laura Pels Theater, explores how those suffering misfortune continue to bear up under the burden of pain.
lead_paragraph: “Sons of the Prophet,” a new comedy-drama by Stephen Karam at the Laura Pels Theater, explores how those suffering misfortune continue to bear up under the burden of pain.

headline.main: Blighted Existences, Eased With Hope and Humor
headline.print_headline: Blighted Existences, Eased With Hope and Humor
headline.seo: ‘Sons of the Prophet’ at Laura Pels Theater - Review
